data.prayer: Father, help the 21,094 believers in Sila to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sila, Chad
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Sila, Chad that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Sila, Chad to the gospel today.
Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Sila.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Bakha people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Bakha people.
Pour your Spirit out on the 289,800 citizens of Sila, Chad, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Sila, Chad.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Sila, Chad has a population of 289,800.

We estimate Sila has 21,094 people who might know Jesus, 52,912 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 215,794 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Sila. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

location.name: Sila
location.people_groups_list: Kajakse, Jegu, Kibet, Bon Gula, Torom
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Kajakse (41,000), Jegu (4,600), Kibet (75,000), Bon Gula (3,300), Torom (21,000)
